full_summary:
# Notice of Proposed Procurement Valves

The Department of National Defence is seeking proposals for the supply of valves, including safety relief, vacuum breaking, and ball valves. The procurement is a request for proposals (RFP) and is open to all qualified suppliers.

## Details of the Procurement
The following items are required:

* Safety Relief Valves:
	+ Part Number: 6534L4Y
	+ NCAGE: 28968 (CIRCOR Instrumentation Technologies, Inc.) or 3CTH6 (Plast-O-Matic Valves, Inc.)
	+ Quantity: 3 (CFB Halifax) and 7 (CFB Esquimalt)
* Vacuum Breaking Valves:
	+ Part Number: FF-1-B
	+ NCAGE: 73124 (Hayward Indl. Products, Inc.)
	+ Quantity: 30 (CFB Halifax) and 30 (CFB Esquimalt)
* Ball Valves:
	+ Part Number: 11350-R2 or Q1060-B
	+ NCAGE: 1D1T5 (Excell Technologies International Corporation) or 3CTH6 (Plast-O-Matic Valves, Inc.)
	+ Quantity: 28 (CFB Halifax) and 18 (CFB Esquimalt)
	+ Part Number: 593-6961322
	+ NCAGE: 53711 (Naval Sea Systems Command)
	+ Quantity: 10 (CFB Halifax) and 12 (CFB Esquimalt)
	+ Part Number: 12-44-7777TT-SE-KV7164
	+ NCAGE: 38003 (Canadian Worcester Controls)
	+ Quantity: 3 (CFB Halifax) and 4 (CFB Esquimalt)

## Tender Details
* Tender Number: W8482-231220/A
* Tender Reference Number: PW-23-01026495
* Amendment Number: 2
* Publication Date: 2023-02-17
* Tender Closing Date: 2023-03-31T14:00:00
* Location: CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia and CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia
* Language: English or French
* Duration: As per the contract

## Evaluation Criteria
Proposals will be evaluated based on the following criteria:
* Price
* Quality
* Delivery Schedule
* Past Performance

## Payment
